events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin our review shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our specialist team.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the recruitment process.
We completed the initial screening of your application and your skills align well with the requirements of this engineering role.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the next stage. We appreciate your prompt response.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC with our lead software engineer.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the interviewers were impressed with your software development expertise.
We have arranged your HR interview for May 10th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview went well; the team appreciated your professional attitude and alignment with company values.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer; we are happy to address any questions you might have.
Congratulations, you have accepted our offer to join as a Software Engineer. We are thrilled to have you on board.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to the team! We will provide all necessary resources for a smooth transition.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your onboarding completed and all formalities finalized.
